_comment: FY2024 Survey Answer Schema - stores only answers, questions are in template
_savings: ~67% space reduction vs full markdown files

engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: Working with newly developed team to gather this information.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: Team is in place for FY25.

planning.process: We did not engage in a planning process.

treatment.barriers: The Town did not engage in activity in FY24, as the planning and implementation was in discussion only. The Town has begun the process for FY25 of developing a team to determine how the funds will be spent.

additional_comments.general: For FY24 the Town did not expend any funds. We have developed a team for FY25 to discuss and implement a strategy and a plan to engage in activities with the populations affected and to expend the funds appropriately.
